263353.<speed=0>\n『施設の人々の管理』の説明です。\n<br>\nマイタウン:
Explanation of "Manage Facility People"... You can change the roles, appearance, etc. of the people in the facilities in My Town, and
register new facilities... When you switch roles, the tone of voice is reset to the initial one set for each facility... To
change the appearance, you'll need a My Town Facility Beauty Parlor Ticket... Note that you can't change the race and gender of the
people in the facility you've registered...

263354.<speed=0>\nマイタウンにいる 施設の人々の\nやくわりや 見た目などを:
<speed=0>You can change the roles, appearance, etc. of
the people in the facility in My Town, and
register new people in the facility.<break>

263356.お別れした場合 元に戻すことはできませんが\n本当に <%sM_npcname>:
If we part ways, we can't undo it, but are
you sure you want to part ways with
<%sM_npcname>?<yesno2>
<close>

263357.マイタウン施設美容院券を 持っていません。\n施設の人の見た目を 変更するには\:
I have a My Town Facility Beauty Parlor ticket... If you want to change the look of someone at the facility, you'll need a Mytown
Facility Hair Salon ticket...

263358.<%sM_npcname>さんを 登録してよろしいですか？\n<yesno>\n:
Are you sure you want to register
<%sM_npcname>?<yesno>
<break>

263359.登録には 素材の消費が必要です。\n素材を消費して 登録を完了します。\nよろし:
To register, you must consume materials. To
complete the registration, you must
consume... Are you sure you want to do this?

263360.登録に 必要な素材が 足りません。: We need more material for registration.

263361.どの場所に 立ってもらいますか？: Where would you like me to stand?

263362.<%sM_npctype>の\n<%sM_npcname>さんが やってきました:
<%sM_npcname> of <%sM_npctype> is here! If
you're in MyTown, you'll need to reenter
MyTown to see the changes...

264940.性別が合わない装備品が 含まれているので\nこの衣装を着ることが できません。:
I can't wear this outfit because it contains
gender-inappropriate equipment...

265404.<%sM_npcname>さんの 設定を 変更しました！\nマイタウンの中にいる:
I've changed <%sM_npcname>'s settings! If
you're in My Town, you'll need to re-enter My
Town to see the changes...

265405.<%sM_npcname>さんと お別れしました。\nマイタウンの中にいる 他の:
I have to say goodbye to <%sM_npcname>... If
you're in My Town, you'll need to re-enter My
Town to see the other people in My Town...

265508.その場所には 配置できません。\n他の場所を 指定してください。:
I can't place it in that location. Please
specify another location...

265509.その名前では 登録できません。\n他の名前を 設定してください。:
You can't register under that name. Please
set another name...

265510.登録に失敗しました。\n時間をおいて もう一度 お試しください。:
Registration failed. Please give it some time
and try again...

265511.お別れすることが できませんでした。\n時間をおいて もう一度 お試しください。:
I can't say goodbye... Please give it some
time and try again...

271738.<%sM_npcname>さんの 衣装を 変更しました！\nマイタウンの中にいる:
I've changed <%sM_npcname>'s costume! If
you're in My Town, you'll need to re-enter My
Town to see the changes...

271990.衣装を変更することが できませんでした。\n時間をおいて もう一度 お試しくださ:
I can't change my costume... Please give it
some time and try again...

275397.名前が 長すぎます。\n他の名前を 設定してください。:
The name is too long... Please set another
name...
